update notify_opinion set NOTY_ID = #{notyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, FIELD1 = #{field1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD2 = #{field2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD3 = #{field3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD4 = #{field4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD5 = #{field5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD6 = #{field6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD7 = #{field7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD8 = #{field8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD9 = #{field9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD10 = #{field10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INUPUT_TIME = #{inuputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RETURN_COMMENTS = #{returnComments,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where OP_ID = #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select OP_ID, NOTY_ID, noo.USER_ID, STATE, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3, FIELD4, FIELD5, FIELD6, FIELD7, FIELD8, FIELD9, FIELD10, INUPUT_TIME, UPDATE_TIME , noo.ATTACHMENT_ID, noo.ATTACHMENT_NAME, noo.RETURN_COMMENTS from notify_opinion noo join notify no on no.NOTIFY_ID = noo.NOTY_ID where noo.NOTY_ID = #{notyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and noo.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select OP_ID, NOTY_ID, noo.USER_ID, STATE, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3, FIELD4, FIELD5, FIELD6, FIELD7, FIELD8, FIELD9, FIELD10, INUPUT_TIME, UPDATE_TIME , noo.ATTACHMENT_ID, noo.ATTACHMENT_NAME, noo.RETURN_COMMENTS from notify_opinion noo join notify no on no.NOTIFY_ID = noo.NOTY_ID where noo.NOTY_ID = #{notyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select OP_ID, NOTY_ID,us.USER_NAME as USER_NAME, dept.DEPT_NAME as DEPT_NAME ,noo.USER_ID, STATE, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3, FIELD4, FIELD5, FIELD6, FIELD7, FIELD8, FIELD9, FIELD10, INUPUT_TIME, UPDATE_TIME , noo.ATTACHMENT_ID, noo.ATTACHMENT_NAME, noo.RETURN_COMMENTS from notify_opinion noo join notify no on no.NOTIFY_ID = noo.NOTY_ID join user us on us.USER_ID=noo.USER_ID join department dept on dept.DEPT_ID = us.DEPT_ID where noo.NOTY_ID = #{notyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select OP_ID, NOTY_ID,us.USER_NAME as USER_NAME, dept.DEPT_NAME as DEPT_NAME ,noo.USER_ID, STATE, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3, FIELD4, FIELD5, FIELD6, FIELD7, FIELD8, FIELD9, FIELD10, INUPUT_TIME, UPDATE_TIME , noo.ATTACHMENT_ID, noo.ATTACHMENT_NAME, noo.RETURN_COMMENTS from notify_opinion noo join notify no on no.NOTIFY_ID = noo.NOTY_ID join "user" us on us.USER_ID=noo.USER_ID join department dept on dept.DEPT_ID = us.DEPT_ID where noo.NOTY_ID = #{notyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
